vote.text: Amendment SA 2720 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2720 proposed by Senator Gardner for Senator Lankford. (consideration: CR S7850-7851; text: CR S7851) To amend the preamble.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2720 proposed by Senator Gardner for Senator Lankford.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2720 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
